resources.string: Use this app to discover different locations in Kuldiga. A hint picture and distance to the location is displayed in the hidden list. Distances to locations are updated automatically about every 10 seconds. Use this to find the location. Open the location you want form the hidden locations list and when you are close enough, it will become discovered and more information about that place will be displayed. If you do not want to actually go to a place, you can discover it using the options menu on the upper right corner of each location. You can reset you score from the Main menu\'s options menu.
Enable location permission in settings to see distance to location
There are no discovered locations See the hidden locations list
Congratulations, all locations found! Reset all locations to hidden from the main menu
Location permission is needed for the app to display distance to target\nPress OK to enable location or DON\'T USE to use the app without this permission\nYou can enable location in options later
